sourcesContent:
Rent Details

No rents available.

Rent ID: {{ rent.rentId }}

Listing ID: {{ rent.listingId }}

User ID: {{ rent.userId }}

Start Date: {{ rent.startDate | date }}

End Date: {{ rent.endDate | date }}

Price: {{ rent.price | currency: 'USD' }}

// rentdetails.component.ts import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RentService } from './rentdetails.service'; import { IRent } from '../rents/rent'; @Component({ selector: 'app-rentdetails', templateUrl: './rentdetails.component.html', styleUrls: ['./rentdetails.component.css'] }) export class RentDetailsComponent implements OnInit { rents: IRent[] = []; constructor(private _rentService: RentService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getRents(); } getRents(): void { this._rentService.getRents() .subscribe(data => { console.log('All Rents', JSON.stringify(data)); this.rents = data; }); } }
